results.title: Impact of Diabetes Mellitus in Patients with Pancreatic Neuro-Endocrine Tumors: Causes, Consequences, and Future Perspectives
results.text_hl: For the first time, a significant association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and a longer progression-free survival (PFS) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with advanced @<m>DISEASE_Neuroectodermal_Tumors_Primitive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018242 @@@pNETS@@@ was found in a small retrospective study of 31 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with advanced grade @DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@pNETs@@@ who were treated between 2009 and 2012.

citations.NLM: Hernandez-Rienda L, Del Olmo-García MI, Merino-Torres JF. Impact of Diabetes Mellitus in Patients with Pancreatic Neuro-Endocrine Tumors: Causes, Consequences, and Future Perspectives Metabolites. 2022 Nov 11;12(11):. PMID: 36422243
citations.BibTeX: @article{36422243, title={Impact of Diabetes Mellitus in Patients with Pancreatic Neuro-Endocrine Tumors: Causes, Consequences, and Future Perspectives}, author={Hernandez-Rienda L and Del Olmo-García MI and Merino-Torres JF}, journal={Metabolites}, volume={12}, number={11}}

results.title: The role of an anti-diabetic drug metformin in the treatment of endocrine tumors.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment has been associated with better response to @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ therapy in @DISEASE_Thyroid_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013964 @@@thyroid cancer@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Neuroectodermal_Tumors_Primitive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018242 @@@pNETs@@@.

citations.NLM: Thakur S, Daley B, Klubo-Gwiezdzinska J. The role of an anti-diabetic drug metformin in the treatment of endocrine tumors. J Mol Endocrinol. 2019 Aug;63(2):R17-R35. PMID: 31307011
citations.BibTeX: @article{31307011, title={The role of an anti-diabetic drug metformin in the treatment of endocrine tumors.}, author={Thakur S and Daley B and Klubo-Gwiezdzinska J}, journal={J Mol Endocrinol}, volume={63}, number={2}, pages={R17-R35}}
